raw_body: DE KRETSER,​ CARLTON LOFTUS (BUNNY),​ beloved husband of Dawn (daughter of the late Egerton and Mary Holsinger),​ precious daddy of Minelli (Iceland),​ Shannon and Neluka (UAE) and Taryne and Chatura Jayatillake,​ darling papa of Shaunel and Taliah,​ son of the late Carlton and Lona,​ brother of Claudette Peries (UK),​ Cedric and Maryanne,​ Roger and Angie (Germany),​ Bernie and Steve Wilson,​ brother-in-law of the late Gerald and Tyronne Holsinger and of Ralph and Deirdre Holsinger (Canada). Remains lie for last respects at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour. Cortege leaves the Parlour at 4.00 p.m. on the 10th January (Wednesday) for Burial at General Cemetery,​ Borella (Roman Catholic Section) at 4.30 p.m.002237
